authStep1: Make sure this Adapter is started.
authStep2: Make sure your robot is on the Home Base and powered on (green lights on).
authStep3: Then press and hold the HOME button on your robot until it plays a series of tones (about 2 seconds).
authStep4: Release the button and your robot will flash WIFI light.
authStep5: Then come back here press the button to retrieve IP and credentials.
auth_info:
Fill in authentication credentials of your robot or retrieve following the subsequent steps.
ATTENTION: The authentication credentials are not the same as you are using in the smartphone app!
donateInformation: Feel free to suggest new features via Github or ioBroker forum. If you like this adapter, you very welcome to donate.
donateTitle: Support the development of the hue-extended Adapter!
message_error-noconnection: No connection to adapter! Please start adapter first.
message_error-nocredentials: Could not retrieve credentials! MAKE SURE TO PRESS AND HOLD --HOME-- BUTTON 2 SECONDS (not the clean button)!
message_error-nopassword: Could not retrieve password! Make sure to cut all other connections to Roomba!
message_error-nopasswordgiven: No password given to show / hide!
reconnect: Reconnect time (in sec.), if connection is lost (0 = no reconnect)
refresh: Refresh time (in sec.) preferences will be retrieved from robot
